name: Soft Gray Facebook
description:
Facebook but softer, better, smoother!
Keep your eyes healthy!
Full Theme (personal profile and page, chat, insights, messenger, marketplace, events, calendar, video player, stories...)
Social plugins/widgets excluded and facebook .onion support!
Feel free to tell me if you see any problems, I'll try to fix them quickly!
Like, share, spread the love... thx

For colored icons, use the "Advanced Style Settings" button below, thanks.

Need a Dark Theme, check out

★ Dusky Gray Facebook [Dark Theme] ★
additional_info:
Please consider donating! I really need all your help and support if you want me to keep this theme up to date, every dollar counts, thank you so much.
? Like Us On Facebook ? Follow Us On Twitter ? Visit Our Website
